title: Vikings Reportedly Close To Deal With OT Mike Remmers | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Vikings Reportedly Close To Deal With OT Mike Remmers posted by Alexander Shun - 
Digital Content Manager | KFAN.com 
The Minnesota Vikings may have just found their other tackle. 
According to NFL Network's Mike Garafolo and other sources, the Vikings are close to finishing a contract with free agent offensive tackle Mike Remmers. Vikings wrapping up a deal with OT Mike Remmers, source says. Expectation is it's done today. â€” Mike Garafolo (@MikeGarafolo) March 10, 2017 
Remmers had a short stint with the Vikings previously back in 2013 but has spent the last three seasons with the Carolina Panthers. 
The belief is that wherever Remmers signs, he will play right tackle. Should that be with the Vikings, that would mean Reiff will be the team's left tackle. 
Nothing is signed yet but if the team adds Remmers, on paper at least, the offensive line will look a lot better than last season. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
